summary: The module extracts simulation results for various health outcomes (appointments, deaths, DALYs) across different treatment policy scenarios, computes comparative statistics such as mean differences and relative changes, and generates bar and horizontal bar charts with confidence intervals to visualise the impact of each treatment set.
business_intent: Enable health system analysts and policymakers to evaluate and communicate how alternative treatment strategies affect service utilisation and health outcomes, supporting evidenceâ€‘based policy decisions.
